articles.author: Shreyashi Sanyal
articles.title: Hong Kong, Taiwan stocks lead gains in Asia markets after Apple earnings; U.S. jobs data in focus - CNBC
articles.description: Investors will be watching the U.S. nonfarm payrolls data after the U.S. Federal Reserve held interest rates steady at the end of its two-day meeting on Wednesday.
articles.content:
HSBC said in a client note that yen weakness plays a key role in "reflating" Japan's economy, a goal that the Bank of Japan expects to achieve this year.
